Enjoy a nutritious and hearty bowl of goodness full of complex carbohydrates with 100% Cream of Rice By Rapid Supplements. This hearty meal supplement delivers a sustained energy supply to fuel your workouts. With 30 grams of carbohydrates per serving, you’ll fuel your muscles with the proper nutrients.

If you’re planning on putting on muscle mass, this supplement is right for you. Containing one of the cleanest sources of nutrients to help you grow, 100% Cream of Rice is formulated with organic granulated Jasmin rice. This carb-loaded supp is delicious and nutritious, which will help you grow and achieve your gains.

100% Cream of Rice By Rapid Supplements is a complex carbohydrate supplement that will make you feel fuller for longer. Even if you are on a low carb diet, this supplement can be the perfect addition to your macros. This formula contains a healthy amount of carbs to help you hit your macros to fuel your body.

The importance of complex carbs, like this supplement, is the energy that carbohydrates give your body. Rice is an excellent source of complex carbohydrates with a medium GI rating. This ingredient is also great to help increase energy levels by refuelling the muscles with readily available Glycogen. Glycogen is used for energy when blood glucose levels drop, and it’s restored when carbohydrates are in the body. In short, your body needs carbs as fuel to burn energy.

The best way to incorporate 100% Cream of Rice into your daily routine is to have it as an option for breakfast or a pre-workout meal to fuel your workouts. Of course, you’ll need to have a diet and exercise plan to help you achieve your goals.

#### What are the benefits of 100% Cream of Rice By Rapid Supplements?

- Delicious and nutritious meal
- Hearty goodness full of carbs
- Fuel your body to smash your workouts
- Sustained energy supply

## PRODUCT OVERVIEW

- [Description](https://supplementsupply.com.au/product/rapid-supplements-cream-of-rice/#tab-description)
- [Additional information](https://supplementsupply.com.au/product/rapid-supplements-cream-of-rice/#tab-additional_information)
- [Reviews (0)](https://supplementsupply.com.au/product/rapid-supplements-cream-of-rice/#tab-reviews)

Enjoy a nutritious and hearty bowl of goodness full of complex carbohydrates with 100% Cream of Rice By Rapid Supplements. This hearty meal supplement delivers a sustained energy supply to fuel your workouts. With 30 grams of carbohydrates per serving, you’ll fuel your muscles with the proper nutrients.

If you’re planning on putting on muscle mass, this supplement is right for you. Containing one of the cleanest sources of nutrients to help you grow, 100% Cream of Rice is formulated with organic granulated Jasmin rice. This carb-loaded supp is delicious and nutritious, which will help you grow and achieve your gains.

100% Cream of Rice By Rapid Supplements is a complex carbohydrate supplement that will make you feel fuller for longer. Even if you are on a low-carb diet, this supplement can be the perfect addition to your macros. This formula contains a healthy amount of carbs to help you hit your macros to fuel your body.

The importance of complex carbs, like this supplement, is the energy that carbohydrates give your body. Rice is an excellent source of complex carbohydrates with a medium GI rating. This ingredient is also great to help increase energy levels by refueling the muscles with readily available Glycogen. Glycogen is used for energy when blood glucose levels drop, and it’s restored when carbohydrates are in the body. In short, your body needs carbs as fuel to burn energy.

The best way to incorporate 100% Cream of Rice into your daily routine is to have it as an option for breakfast or a pre-workout meal to fuel your workouts. Of course, you’ll need to have a diet and exercise plan to help you achieve your goals.

What are the benefits of 100% Cream of Rice By Rapid Supplements?

▪ Delicious and nutritious meal

▪ Hearty goodness full of carbs

▪ Fuel your body to smash your workouts ▪ Sustained energy supply

| Flavour | Cinnamon, Chocolate, Peanut Butter, Strawberries & Cream |

Product Information

Pure Cream of Rice is a delicious bowl of hearty goodness full of complex carbohydrates to fuel your workouts. Cream of rice can also be consumed as a healthy meal for a sustained energy supply. Naturally flavoured with no artificial sweeteners it is gentle on the stomach, ready in minutes and keeps you feeling fuller for longer.

Benefits

No more skipping meals - High quality, low calorie ingredients made for long lasting energy. Cream of Rice makes low calorie meals effortless, providing pure, natural fuel for your day.

What’s Inside & Why It Matters

Organic Granulated Jasmine Rice

A premium, gluten-free carb source that digests easily and fuels your body with steady energy. Jasmine rice is rich in complex carbohydrates that help replenish glycogen stores, support recovery, and keep you performing at your best without bloating or sluggishness.

goMCT® (Medium Chain Triglycerides)

A clean, plant-based fat that delivers fast, sustained energy for both your muscles and mind. goMCT® supports metabolism, enhances focus, and promotes fat utilisation helping you power through intense training sessions or long workdays.

Acacia Fibre

A gentle prebiotic fibre that supports gut health and digestion, keeping your stomach settled even when calories go up. It helps maintain nutrient absorption and smooth digestion, so you can fuel harder without the discomfort.

Cocoa Powder

Naturally rich in antioxidants and minerals, cocoa doesn’t just give that rich chocolate taste it helps reduce inflammation and support muscle recovery after training.

Stevia & Natural Flavours

Naturally sweetened and flavoured for a clean, delicious taste, no artificial aftertaste, no added sugars, just a smooth, satisfying meal you’ll actually look forward to.

## Frequently Asked Questions

- What is Cream of Rice and why should I use it?




Cream of Rice is a clean, easily digestible carbohydrate source made from premium jasmine rice. It provides sustained energy, helps you hit your calorie goals, and supports muscle recovery — perfect for athletes, lifters, or anyone looking to fuel performance.

- What makes Cream of Rice a good pre-workout meal?




Absolutely. Cream of Rice is perfect for anyone who wants clean, sustained energy and balanced nutrition. It’s light, easy to digest, and packed with quality carbs to support performance, recovery, and everyday wellbeing — whether your goal is training harder or simply feeling your best.

- Can women use Cream of Rice too?




Absolutely! It’s great for both men and women who want more sustained energy, improved recovery, or help meeting daily calorie and carb needs — whether training for strength, endurance, or general fitness.

- When is the best time to have Cream of Rice?




It’s perfect **pre- or post-workout** for energy and recovery, or as a quick, easy meal any time of day when you need a clean carb hit.


- Is Cream of Rice gluten-free?




Yes — it’s made from pure jasmine rice and is 100% gluten-free, making it gentle on digestion and suitable for most dietary needs.

- Can I mix Cream of Rice with protein powder?




Definitely! It pairs perfectly with your favourite protein powder to create a **complete, high-performance meal** — great for bulking, recovery, or breakfast on the go.

- How do I prepare it?




Simply mix one scoop (40 g) with hot water or milk and stir until smooth. Adjust the liquid for your preferred texture — or blend it cold into a shake for a quick, on-the-go carb source.

- Will Cream of Rice upset my stomach?




No — it’s designed to be **light, easy to digest, and bloat-free**, even for those with sensitive stomachs or gluten intolerance.

#### [Description](https://www.supplementwarehouse.com.au/products/100-pure-cream-of-rice-by-rapid-supplements\#TabCollapseproduct_tab_title_1)

100% Pure Cream of Rice by Rapid Supplements is a delicious nutritious bowl of hearty goodness full of complex carbohydrates to fuel your workouts alternatively Cream of Rice can be consumed as a hearty meal for a sustained energy supply.

**The benefits of 100% Cream of Rice By Rapid Supplements include:**

- Delicious and nutritious meal
- Hearty goodness full of carbs
- Fuel your body to smash your workouts
- Sustained energy supply

* * *

**Warning:** This product is not a sole source of nutrition and should be consumed in conjunction with a nutritious diet and an appropriate training or exercise program. Not suitable for children under 15 years of age or pregnant women: Should only be used under medical or dietetic supervision.

#### [Shipping & Delivery](https://www.supplementwarehouse.com.au/products/100-pure-cream-of-rice-by-rapid-supplements\#TabCollapseproduct_tab_title_2)

Delivery anywhere in Australia, for any size order **under $150** is a flat rate of **$9.95** or have it shipped Express for **$14.95**.

If your order total is **over $150**, then shipping is **FREE!** Upgrade to Express Shipping for an extra **$4.95**!

You don't have to wait forever for your supplements to arrive. If you order **before 3pm AEST**, we will dispatch your order the same day (\*excludes weekends, public holidays, and sale days)!

Over 97% of our customers receive their orders within 1-2 days!
